question: Section 21 of the Army Rules, 1954 that was recently mentioned in the news, deals with which of the following?
option1: Army’s special power to maintain public order
option2: Army’s right to choose a cadre
option3: Prohibition of army from involving in politics
answer: Prohibition of army from involving in politics
explanation: The Section 21 of the Army Rules, 1954 was scrutinized recently following the Army Chief’s recent comments. This law has the power to alter the fundamental rights of the citizens who are enrolling to the armed forces even if they are guaranteed by the constitution. It prohibits the army personnel from attending or addressing any meeting or taking part in any demonstration organised for any political purposes or even communicating or publishing anything related to politics.
